message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a fair price considering its value and rarity. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

I'm very interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1500000. This price takes into account your concerns while still reflecting the product's true value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but $1500000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $1000000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1000000. Considering the product's value and rarity, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm afraid $1200000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to make a final offer of $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
